verbose_text: Immunohistochemistry of the retinal sections revealed that the CCN1, p-PI3K and p-AKT expression levels were weakly detected only in the ganglion cell layer (GCL) and inner plexiform layer (IPL) of the normoxia group, whereas in the hyperoxia and hyperoxia scrambled siRNA groups, they were strongly detected in the GCL, IPL, inner nuclear layer (INL) and outer plexiform layer (OPL), with neovascularization breaking through the ILM.
